amendment.description: To strike the amendment to the limitation on the United States share of assessments for United Nations Peacekeeping operations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 266 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 266 proposed by Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S3172-3173; text: CR S3172) To strike the amendment to the limitation on the United States share of assessments for United Nations Peacekeeping operations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 266 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 266 proposed by Senator Lugar.
